statements: GRANT SELECT ON analytics_data TO analyst1
GRANT INSERT ON analytics_data TO analyst2
GRANT UPDATE(event_value) ON analytics_data TO analyst3

GRANT INSERT ON TABLE analytics.products TO clerk_role
GRANT UPDATE, DELETE ON TABLE analytics.orders TO manager_role

GRANT INSERT, UPDATE ON Sales TO sales_team
GRANT DELETE ON Sales TO admin_team
